original_text: Moreover, I swore to them in the wilderness that I would scatter them among the nations and disperse them through the countries,
korean_text: 또 내가 내 손을 들어 광야에서 그들에게 맹세하기를 내가 그들을 이방인 중에 흩으며 여러 민족 가운데에 헤치리라 하였나니

sentences.original_text: Moreover, I swore to them in the wilderness
that I would scatter them among the nations
and disperse them through the countries,
